info.title: European Parliament Open Data API
info.description: API giving access to data published on the Open Data Portal of the European Parliament (EP).

tags.name: MEPS
tags.description: Returns data about the Members of the European Parliament (MEPs)

tags.name: EP BODIES
tags.description: Returns data about EP Corporate Bodies

language.name: language
language.description: Language of the resource. Values are ISO 639-1 language codes identifying the 24 official languages of the EU + 'mul' that refers to resources in multiple languages. If no language parameter is selected, the service will return results in all the available languages.

gender.name: gender
gender.description: Gender of the person. The non-exhaustive list of values includes concepts of the Human sex authority table maintained by the Publications Office of the European Union: https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/concept-scheme/-/resource?uri=http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/human-sex .

country-of-representation.name: country-of-representation
country-of-representation.description: 27 EU Member States and UK. Values are ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country codes.

political-group.name: political-group
political-group.description: EP political groups. The non-exhaustive list of values includes  concepts of the Corporate body authority table maintained by the Publications Office of the European Union: https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/concept-scheme/-/resource?uri=http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/corporate-body . Concepts referring to EP political groups will have 'EP_GROUP' as a Corporate body classification

body-classification.name: body-classification
body-classification.description: EP Corporate Body classification. The non-exhaustive list of values includes  concepts of the Corporate bodies classification authority table maintained by the Publications Office of the European Union: https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/concept-scheme/-/resource?uri=http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/corporate-body-classification.

committee.name: committee
committee.description: EP Committees. The non-exhaustive list of values includes concepts of the Corporate body authority table maintained by the Publications Office of the European Union: https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/concept-scheme/-/resource?uri=http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/corporate-body . Concepts referring to EP Committees will have 'EP_CMT' as a Corporate body classification

work-type-committe.name: work-type
work-type-committe.description: A type of a Work. Values are concepts of the Resource type authority table maintained by the Publications Office of the European Union: https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/concept-scheme/-/resource?uri=http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/resource-type .

work-type.name: work-type
work-type.description: A type of a Work. Values are concepts of the Resource type authority table maintained by the Publications Office of the European Union: https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/concept-scheme/-/resource?uri=http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/resource-type .

work-type-all.name: work-type
work-type-all.description: A type of a Work. Values are concepts of the Resource type authority table maintained by the Publications Office of the European Union: https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/concept-scheme/-/resource?uri=http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/resource-type .

parliamentary-term.name: parliamentary-term
parliamentary-term.description: Parliamentary Term from 0 to the current.

parliamentary-term-optional.name: parliamentary-term
parliamentary-term-optional.description: Parliamentary Term from 0 to the current.

year.name: year
year.description: Year. The format of the values is YYYY.

session.name: session
session.description: Plenary Session. Parliament sits monthly in Strasbourg in a four-day part-session (Monday to Thursday). Additional part-sessions are held in Brussels. This parameter refers to the date of the first day of a given part-session. The format of the value is YYYY-MM-DD.

offset.name: offset
offset.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set.

limit.name: limit
limit.description: The number of items to return.

limit500.name: limit
limit500.description: The number of items to return.

activity-type.name: activity-type
activity-type.description: A type of an Activity. Values are concepts of the Event authority table maintained by the Publications Office of the European Union: https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/concept-scheme/-/resource?uri=http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/event .

get.summary: Returns the list of all the MEPs
get.description: The service returns data about the MEPs related to the European Parliament.

get.summary: Returns a single MEP for the specified mep ID
get.description: The service returns a single MEP for the specified mep ID.

get.summary: Returns the list of all active MEPs for today's date
get.description: The service returns the list of active MEPs for today's date.

get.summary: Returns the list of all incoming MEPs for the current parliamentary term
get.description: The service returns the list of incoming MEPs for the current parliamentary term.

get.summary: Returns the list of all outgoing MEPs for the current parliamentary term
get.description: The service returns the list of outgoing MEPs for the current parliamentary term.

get.summary: Returns a feed of MEPs (published or updated in the last month).
get.description: The service returns a feed of MEPs (published or updated in the last month).

get.summary: Returns the list of all EP Corporate Bodies
get.description: The service returns a list of all the EP Corporate Bodies.

get.summary: Returns a feed of EP Corporate Body (published or updated in the last month).
get.description: The service returns a feed of EP Corporate Body (published or updated in the last month).

get.summary: Returns a single EP Corporate Body for the specified body ID
get.description: The service returns a single EP Corporate Body for the specified body ID.

get.summary: Returns the list of all current bodies for today's date
get.description: The service returns the list of all current bodies for today's date.

get.summary: Returns the list of all EP Documents
get.description: The service returns the list of all EP Documents.

get.summary: Returns a feed of EP Documents (published or updated in the last month).
get.description: The service returns a feed of EP Documents (published or updated in the last month).

get.summary: Returns a single EP Document for the specified doc ID
get.description: The service returns a single EP Document for the specified doc ID.

get.summary: Returns the list of all EP Plenary Documents
get.description: The service returns the list of all EP Plenary Documents.

parameters.name: work-type
parameters.description: A type of a Work. Values are concepts of the Resource type authority table maintained by the Publications Office of the European Union: https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/concept-scheme/-/resource?uri=http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/resource-type .

get.summary: Returns a single EP Plenary Document for the specified doc ID
get.description: The service returns a single EP Plenary Document for the specified doc ID.

get.summary: Returns a feed of EP Plenary Documents (published or updated in the last month).
get.description: The service returns a feed of EP Plenary Documents (published or updated in the last month).

get.summary: Returns the list of all EP Questions
get.description: The service returns the list of all EP Questions.

parameters.name: work-type
parameters.description: A type of a Work. Values are concepts of the Resource type authority table maintained by the Publications Office of the European Union: https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/concept-scheme/-/resource?uri=http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/resource-type .

get.summary: Returns a single EP Question document for the specified doc ID
get.description: The service returns a single EP Question document for the specified doc ID.

get.summary: Returns a feed of EP Questions Documents (published or updated in the last month).
get.description: The service returns a feed of EP Questions Documents (published or updated in the last month).

get.summary: Returns the list of all EP Plenary Session documents
get.description: The service returns the list of all EP Plenary Session documents.

get.summary: Returns a single EP Plenary Session document for the specified doc ID
get.description: The service returns a single EP Plenary Session document for the specified doc ID.

get.summary: Returns a feed of EP Plenary Session Documents (published or updated in the last month).
get.description: The service returns a feed of EP Plenary Session Documents (published or updated in the last month).

get.summary: Returns the list of all EP Adopted Texts
get.description: The service returns the list of all EP Adopted Texts.

parameters.name: work-type
parameters.description: A type of a Work. Values are concepts of the Resource type authority table maintained by the Publications Office of the European Union: https://op.europa.eu/en/web/eu-vocabularies/concept-scheme/-/resource?uri=http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/resource-type .

get.summary: Returns a feed of EP Adopted texts (published or updated in the last month).
get.description: The service returns a feed of EP Adopted texts (published or updated in the last month).

get.summary: Returns a single EP Adopted Text document for the specified doc ID
get.description: The service returns a single EP Adopted Text document for the specified doc ID.

get.summary: Returns the list of all EP Committe Documents
get.description: The service returns the list of all EP Committe Documents.

get.summary: Returns a single EP Committe Document for the specified doc ID
get.description: The service returns a single EP Committe Document for the specified doc ID.

get.summary: Returns a feed of EP Committe Document (published or updated in the last month).
get.description: The service returns a feed of EP Committe Document (published or updated in the last month).

get.summary: Returns the list of all EP Meetings
get.description: The service returns the list of all EP Meetings. Note: this is a beta version for the current release.

get.summary: Returns a single EP Meeting for the specified event ID
get.description: The service returns a single EP Meeting for the specified event ID. Note: this is a beta version for the current release.

get.summary: Returns all decisions in a single EP Meeting
get.description: The service returns all decisions for a single EP Meeting ID. Note: this is a beta version for the current release, the scope is limited to roll-call-votes.

get.summary: Returns all decisions in a single EP Meeting
get.description: The service returns a single Decision for the specified Decision ID. Note: this is a beta version for the current release, the scope is limited to roll-call-votes.

get.summary: Returns all vote results in a single EP Meeting
get.description: The service returns all vote results for a single EP Meeting ID. Note: this is a beta version for the current release, the scope is limited to roll-call-votes.

get.summary: Returns all vote results for a single Decision id
get.description: The service returns a single Vote among a list of vote results for a specified Meeting ID. Note: this is a beta version for the current release, the scope is limited to roll-call-votes.

get.summary: Returns the list of all EP Events
get.description: The service returns the list of all EP Events.

get.summary: Returns a single EP Events for the specified event ID
get.description: The service returns a single EP Events for the specified event ID.
